---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---


```{r}
setClass("newMatrix", representation(history = "character"),  
         contains = "matrix")

m <- new("newMatrix", 1:4, 2, 2, history = "ipsum")

setMethod("show",
          "newMatrix",
          function(object){
            show(object@.Data)
          })
```


```{r}
m
```

```{r}
print.newMatrix <- function(x, ...){
 print(x@.Data)

}

setMethod("print",
          "newMatrix",
          print.newMatrix)
```

```{r}
m
```
